message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to get a premium item at a discounted price. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you might miss out on a great deal.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the rarity and the discount, I believe this is a good opportunity. I'll take the high-quality product.

I'm offering you a product that's been thoroughly inspected and tested. It's a great value for the price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I've sold many similar products to satisfied customers, and I'm sure you'll be the next one. The price is still $1000000, a steal for a product of this caliber.
Based on your positive feedback about the product's inspection and past sales, I trust your judgment. I'll purchase this product as well.

I'm offering you a product that's been thoroughly cleaned and polished. It's a great opportunity to own a unique item that's been well-maintained. The price remains the same, $1000000, which is a fraction of its true value. I'm confident you'll be happy with this purchase.
While I appreciate the effort put into cleaning and maintaining the product, given the price and my previous experience with low-quality items, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

Given the special guarantee and the opportunity to potentially receive an additional high-quality item, I'm confident in making this purchase. Thank you for the generous offer, Alice.
